name: 10 Breaths: Meditation Tool
description:
This is a meditation tool you can use to improve your concentration in a meditation center. It challenges you to count your breaths, 10 at a time, which can help calm the monkey-mind, and improve focus. 

This tool offers an immersive first-person perspective in a pretty, empty world with a day/night cycle to bring a sense of focus and calm to your practice. Instructions will guide you through your first few sessions, and your daily streak will be tracked when using the app.

If you have any questions or comments, or run into any bugs, feel free to comment below.
